        serverName - name of the Instance

      • handleJarArtifact

      • handleStartJava

        public java.util.List<com.scaleset.cfbuilder.beanstalk.OptionSetting> handleStartJava(JavaApplication node)
        Handles the start lifecycle Operation for a JavaApplication node.
        It generates a list of OptionSetting where each OptionSetting contains a environment variables defined in the start lifecycle. These are needed for the Beanstalk Application.
        Parameters:
        node - the JavaApplication node to handle the start lifecycle for
        Returns:
        a list of OptionSettings from environment variables
